p: The present study was focused on the chemical constituents and larvicidal activity of Coccinia grandis leaf essential oil against vectors of malaria ( An. stephensi), dengue ( Ae. aegypti) and filariasis ( Culex quinquefasciatus). To the best of our knowledge it is the first report on the larvicidal activity of Coccinia grandis leaf essential oil against the three mosquito species.
